column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We tried every sangria on the menu except the standard white and the white peach.  My favorite was the black raspberry
column2: but they were all really good!  Strong enough
column4: and the flavored ones did have really good flavor (black rasp.
column8: the hard / no-back bar stools became more and more comfortable.  So that was a bonus.
